name: Encrypted Windows 10 App Bundle
summary: An EMSIXBUNDLE file is an encrypted Windows 10 app bundle ( .MSIXBUNDLE file). It contains one or more versions of an app, each of which is built for a specific computer processor architecture (x86, x64, or ARM). EMSIXBUNDLE files are encrypted so end users cannot unpack and view their contents.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
